Hello again,
i'm not an java developer and have asked my colleague to imple=
ment this feature in Heritrix.
After a quick view he resign :-(

Because i =
absolutely need this feature I would pay for the implementation. 
Maybe som=
eone can integrate this feature like Noahs notes. 

- ExtractorHTML extract=
 the link normally
- ScriptedDecideRule, reject the url from further proces=
sing
- CrawlURI.linkContext should get the rel=3Dnofollow Tag
- enhanced HT=
MLLinkContext

What i need is a possibility to reject <a href=3D".." rel=3D=
"nofollow" > links from crawling.

best wishes
Tom
